description: Detects usage of Gpg4win to encrypt/decrypt files located in potentially suspicious locations.
name: File Encryption/Decryption Via Gpg4win From Suspicious Locations
query: process.command_line:*\-passphrase* AND ((process.executable:(*\\gpg.exe OR *\\gpg2.exe)) OR process.pe.product:GNU\ Privacy\ Guard\ \(GnuPG\) OR process.pe.description:GnuPGâ€™s\ OpenPGP\ tool) AND (process.command_line:(*\:\\PerfLogs\\* OR *\:\\Temp\\* OR *\:\\Users\\Public\\* OR *\:\\Windows\\Temp\\* OR *\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\* OR *\\AppData\\Roaming\\*))
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
